New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored a century off 40 balls, setting a new record for the fastest ever at an ICC Men's Cricket World Cup
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell and Pat Cummins put on a 103-run partnership for the seventh wicket
Australia crushed Netherlands by a record-breaking 309 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell said that he didn't expect to produce such a performance on the day, particularly as he was carrying a bit of an illness
Pat Cummins described Maxwell's century as a 'freak show'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxwell's six previous innings in the calendar year had yielded just 62 runs, and a 31* against Sri Lanka was his only real contribution with the bat in Australiaâ€™s World Cup campaign
Others: The match took place at the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023
The next match for Australia is against New Zealand in Dharamsala on Saturday
